extendedIngredients.name: cherry gelatin
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 pkg. (3 oz. each) JELL-O Cherry Flavor Gelatin

extendedIngredients.name: cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 oz. (1/2 of 8-oz. pkg.) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened

extendedIngredients.name: mandarin oranges
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (15 oz.) DOLE Mandarin Oranges, drained

extendedIngredients.name: whipped topping
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tub (8 oz.) COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed

recipes.title: Orange-Cherry Delight
recipes.instructions: Add boiling water to gelatin mixes in medium bowl; stir 2 min. until completely dissolved.  Stir in cold water.  Refrigerate 1-1/4 hours or until slightly thickened.  Reserve a few orange segments for garnish.  Gently stir remaining oranges into gelatin.                                            Beat cream cheese and sugar in separate medium bowl with whisk until blended.  Stir in COOL WHIP.  Spoon into 2-1/2-qt. serving bowl; cover with gelatin mixture.                                             Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.  Garnish with reserved oranges before serving.

steps.step: Add boiling water to gelatin mixes in medium bowl; stir 2 min. until completely dissolved.  Stir in cold water.  Refrigerate 1-1/4 hours or until slightly thickened.  Reserve a few orange segments for garnish.  Gently stir remaining oranges into gelatin.
Beat cream cheese and sugar in separate medium bowl with whisk until blended.  Stir in COOL WHIP.  Spoon into 2-1/2-qt. serving bowl; cover with gelatin mixture.
Garnish with reserved oranges before serving.
